text:
Consider this snippet:

<mail mailhost="mail.company.com" encoding="plain"
    subject="New mail">
    <from name="Osipov, Michael" address="me@company.com" />
    <to name="Osipov, Michael" address="me@company.com" />
    <message mimetype="text/plain" charset="UTF-8">
        Cool
    </message>
</mail>

Names are not quoted in request headers and mail is mangled. One has to quote with " or switch to encoding="auto|mime".
